description: Try our easy to follow Mini Vegan Patties recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Snack,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Plant-based,Low sugar,Nov 2019,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tofu,Dairy free
name: Mini Vegan Patties Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs coriander (plus extra sprigs to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Process stir-fry traditional vegetables in a food processor until finely chopped. Add half of the tofu, bean burger mix and 2/3 cup boiling water. Pulse to combine. Transfer to a bowl.
Divide and shape into 22 small patties and place onto tray. Spray well on both sides with olive oil cooking spray. Bake for 20 minutes, turning halfway, or until golden.
Meanwhile, to make the dipping sauce, process remaining tofu, tahini, coriander and garlic until smooth. Season and transfer to a small bowl.
Garnish patties with extra corriander sprigs and serve with dipping sauce.
